name: MidNight Cemetery
description:
This is a Dark themed First Person inventory Adventure - Point&Click. 

Explore an ancient abandoned cemetery in a dark rainy night. You must find your brother and get out of there alive... also, find out what dark secret is concealed beneath that place, if you can... 

There are three possible endings depending on your choices during the game.

You can Download the Android/Windows/Linux  version  here on Itchio:

Or you can play for free the HTML5 version on your browser here: 

 Play MidNightCemetery on Browser HTML5 version

Also, check out these other projects from Maloke Games!
